text: Hagau ina mai dahi daane dela koia e iloo di hodo, maaga, paa nia mee, e iloo di ngalua gi nia goolo, silber, baalanga mmee, mo nia baalanga, e iloo labelaa di hai nia gahu halatee, halatee luuli mo mmee. Mee ga hagamaamaa digau hau hale o Judah mo Jerusalem ala ne hilihili go dogu damana go David.
